livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service

commit e38ceaf3ec323c40c6fed17daae42183d172d2e4
parent c8b8b9ae7fefb277855f8687a34eb99660e2132a
Author: Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>
Date:   Wed, 13 Sep 2017 20:56:52 +0000

Load highlight.js & theme from cdnjs

This was a major contributor to bundle size, since the bundle pulled in
all languages supported by highlight.js. The version hosted on cdnjs
only supports a large handful of popular languages; we can add support
for additional languages on a one-off basis if we desire.

Diffstat:
